sentences.en: Alison had an inspiration.
sentences.cn: 艾莉森有了条妙计。

sentences.en: Already she was moving forward with a steady grace, born of inspiration.
sentences.cn: 她已经在灵感的引导下, 迈着优雅的步子沉着镇定地走向前去.

sentences.en: At this dark and hopeless moment an inspiration burst upon him!
sentences.cn: 正在这灰心绝望的时刻,他忽然灵机一动,计上心来.

sentences.en: Dreams can be a rich source of inspiration for an artist.
sentences.cn: 梦境可以成为艺术家灵感的丰富源泉。

sentences.en: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.cn: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.en: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.cn: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.en: He had an inspiration: he'd give her a dog for her birthday.
sentences.cn: 他突然想到一个好主意，他要送她一条狗作为生日礼物。

sentences.en: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.cn: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

sentences.en: He is a witty man, and an inspiration to all of us.
sentences.cn: 他机智风趣，鼓舞激励着我们所有人。

sentences.en: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.cn: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.en: Her charity work is an inspiration to us all.
sentences.cn: 她的慈善工作激励着我们大家。

sentences.en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentences.en: Many poets and artists have drawn their inspiration from nature.
sentences.cn: 许多诗人和艺术家从大自然中获得灵感.

sentences.en: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.cn: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.en: People like Tara are an inspiration to us all. ＃
sentences.cn: 像塔拉这样的人鼓舞着我们大家。

sentences.en: Powell's unusual journey to high office is an inspiration to millions.
sentences.cn: 鲍威尔升任高官的不寻常历程对许多人来说是一种激励。

sentences.en: She takes her inspiration from shells and stones she finds on the seashore.
sentences.cn: 她从在海滩上捡到的贝壳和石子中汲取灵感。

sentences.en: She was a great inspiration. She was the person who impressed us with the importance of research.
sentences.cn: 她极大地鼓舞了我们，让我们深刻了解到研究的重要性。

sentences.en: She'll certainly be an inspiration to them on the sports field.
sentences.cn: “在运动场上,她一定会给他们带来灵感.

sentences.en: Some sacred inspiration perhaps had come to him.
sentences.cn: 也许他得到了某种神的启示.

sentences.en: The inspiration stemming from his travels lasted the length of his career.
sentences.cn: 由旅行得来的灵感伴随了他的整个职业生涯。

sentences.en: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.cn: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.en: The verse rose up to fire his breast with inspiration.
sentences.cn: 这首诗激发了他的灵感。

sentences.en: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.cn: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.en: What better way of finding inspiration for your own garden than by visiting others.
sentences.cn: 还有什么比参观别人花园更好的获取灵感、扮靓自家花园的方法呢。

words.tran_cn: 鼓舞人心的；灌输的；启发灵感的
鼓舞；激发；使感悟（inspire的ing形式）
激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感
能量,精力,热情,兴奋,狂热
鼓励,安慰,放松,帮助,强化

trans.tran_cn: 灵感，鼓舞人心/启发灵感的人或事，好主意
trans.tran_en: a good idea about what you should do, write, say etc, especially one which you get suddenly
